ivardefs.name: authority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the authority who published the protocol (e.g. ACIP).

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date the evaluation of the vaccine administration event was performed.

ivardefs.name: doseStatus
ivardefs.desc: Indicates if the dose is valid or not valid with respect to the published recommendations.

ivardefs.name: doseStatusReason_
ivardefs.desc: Provides an explanation as to why the vaccine administration event is valid or not relative to the published recommendations.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to this immunization evaluation record.

ivardefs.name: immunizationEvent
ivardefs.desc: The vaccine administration event being evaluated.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The individual for whom the evaluation is being done.

ivardefs.name: series
ivardefs.desc: One possible path to achieve presumed immunity against a disease - within the context of an authority.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the current status of the evaluation of the vaccination administration event.

ivardefs.name: targetDisease
ivardefs.desc: The vaccine preventable disease the dose is being evaluated against.

properties.desc: Describes a comparison of an immunization event against published recommendations to determine if the administration is "valid" in relation to those  recommendations.
